mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE_NUM AS deviceNum, GPS_TIME AS gpsTime, LNG, LAT, LNG_BD AS lngBd, LAT_BD AS latBd, LNG_GC AS lngGc, LAT_GC AS latGc, IF( OBD_SPEED IS NOT NULL, OBD_SPEED, SPEED ) AS speed, IF( OBD_ACC IS NOT NULL, OBD_ACC, ACC ) AS almAccon, DIRECTION_NAME AS directionName, OBD_MESSAGE AS locMode FROM ${condition.gpsTable} WHERE DEVICE_NUM = ${condition.deviceNum} AND GPS_TIME <= ${condition.beginTime} ORDER BY GPS_TIME DESC LIMIT 1
